errors.EVENTS_LIMIT: Too much events to display all of them
errors.EVENT_LOG_LIMIT: Too much participants to display all of them
errors.CANNOT_REMOVE_CUSTOMER: You are not allowed to remove the customer of {{resource}}, change the payment information first.
errors.UNSUBSCRIBED_OPTION: Sorry, it seems you did not subscribe to this option. Please update your subscription before coming back here.

schemas.EVENTS_LOCATION_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the location of this event
schemas.EVENTS_EXPIRE_AT_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the expiration date for this event
schemas.EVENTS_LOG_COMMENT_FIELD_LABEL: Enter your comment for this step

side-nav.SIDENAV_LABEL: Open the main menu any time using this handle.
side-nav.ORGANISATIONS_LABEL: Access your dashboard to manage your organisations and their parameters.
side-nav.CONTEXT_HELP_LABEL: To get contextual help whenever your are lost simply click on the following icon
side-nav.ABOUT_LABEL: Display detailed system information and send us bug reports.
side-nav.BUG_LABEL: Send us a bug report with a preformatted email containing required information.
side-nav.SETTINGS_LABEL: Update general settings of the system on your device.
side-nav.LOGOUT_LABEL: Logout in order to close your work session.
side-nav.SESSION_LABEL: Otherwise the session will remain active a couple of days on your device, you will not have to login again in this time frame.

organisations.ORGANISATIONS_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the organisations in your organisation.
organisations.ORGANISATION_DEFINITION_LABEL: An organisation is a shared workspace where you can invite people to join and collaborate.
organisations.ORGANISATION_LABEL: Enter the context of one of your organisation by selecting its name.
organisations.ORGANISATION_LINK_LABEL: Enter the context of this organisation
organisations.SEARCH_LABEL: Type part of a word contained in the name of your organisations in the arising bar to perform a search.
organisations.SORT_LABEL: Sort your organisations by ascending or descending alphabetical order this button.
organisations.NEW_ORGANISATION_LABEL: Create a new organisation using this button.
organisations.NEW_ORGANISATION_LINK_LABEL: How to create a new organisation to share your events
organisations.EVENTS_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the events in your organisation.
organisations.CATALOG_LABEL: Use this shortcut to manage the geographic catalog of your organisation.
organisations.ARCHIVED_EVENTS_LABEL: Use this shortcut to open the history of your events.
organisations.ARCHIVED_EVENTS_LINK_LABEL: How to explore the history of your events
organisations.TEMPLATES_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the event templates in your organisation.
organisations.APP_BAR_ACTIONS_LABEL: Les activités principales sont directement disponibles via la barre d'actions.
organisations.OVERFLOW_MENU_LABEL: Les autres activités disponibles sont accessibles via ce menu déroulant.
organisations.MEMBERS_LABEL: This entry allows to manage the members of your organisation.
organisations.GROUPS_LABEL: This entry allows to manage the groups in your organisation.
organisations.SETTINGS_LABEL: This entry allows to manage the settings of your organisation.
organisations.UPDATE_ORGANISATION_LABEL: Update properties of your organisation through this action (name, logo, etc.).
organisations.REMOVE_ORGANISATION_LABEL: Remove your organisation through this action.
organisations.REMOVE_CONFIRMATION_LABEL: $t(tours.REMOVE_CONFIRMATION_LABEL) You must first remove all your organisation groups.

organisation.PROPERTIES_LABEL: This tab allows to update your organisation information
organisation.NAME_LABEL: Its name as viewed by others users.
organisation.BILLING_LABEL: This tab allows to update your subscriptions
organisation.CUSTOMER_LABEL: This section recaps your current method of payment.
organisation.PAYMENT_METHOD_LABEL: This button allows to update it.
organisation.CUSTOMER_EMAIL_LABEL: Select the owner of the organisation who will receive the invoices.
organisation.INVOICE_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Enter a mention to be added to your invoice.
organisation.VAT_NUMBER_LABEL: If your payment is related to a company please enter your VAT number here.
organisation.CARD_LABEL: Insert here the information of your payment card.
organisation.BASIC_PLAN_LABEL: This section shows your plan and those available.
organisation.SILVER_PLAN_LABEL: You can change it anytime for a new one better suited to your needs.
organisation.OPTIONAL_PLANS_LABEL: This section shows your additional plans.
organisation.ARCHIVING_PLAN_LABEL: Activate events archiving by selecting this plan.
organisation.CATALOG_PLAN_LABEL: Activate the geographic catalog by selecting this plan.

events.EVENTS_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the events in your organisation.
events.EVENT_DEFINITION_LABEL: An event allows you to share information and photos as well as interacting with participants on the field.
events.SEARCH_LABEL: Type part of a word contained in the name of your events in the arising bar to perform a search.
events.SORT_LABEL: Sort your events by ascending or descending alphabetical/chronological order this button.
events.TEMPLATES_LABEL: Before creating an event you need to create at least one model using this activity.
events.SELECT_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Whenever you want to create a new event simply pick the right template using the action button.
events.EVENT_CARD_LABEL: Each event is viewed as a card providing available actions.
events.UPDATE_EVENT_LABEL: Update properties of your event through this action.
events.FOLLOW_UP_EVENT_LABEL: As a coordinator follow this event up on a cartographic view through this action.
events.FOLLOW_UP_ACTION_LABEL: As a participant you can interact with your coordinator through this action.
events.ADD_PHOTO_LABEL: Take a picture and associate it to your event through this action.
events.ADD_MEDIA_LABEL: Join files to your event through this action.
events.EVENT_MAP_LABEL: View the map of your event through this action.
events.REMOVE_EVENT_LABEL: Remove your event through this action.
events.REMOVE_CONFIRMATION_LABEL:
$t(tours.REMOVE_CONFIRMATION_LABEL), this will send a

notification to all participants.

create-event.EVENT_NAME_LABEL: Choose a name for your event.
create-event.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Enter a detailed description for your event.
create-event.LOCATION_LABEL: Define the location of your event.
create-event.SHOW_MAP_LABEL: Visualise the location of your event on a map.
create-event.SEARCH_ADDRESS_LABEL: Enter the whole adress or part of it and select among the different results.
create-event.SELECT_PARTICIPANTS_LABEL: Select the participants of the event.
create-event.PARTICIPANTS_LABEL: Typing the first characters of a user name, a group name or a tag name make it selectable. Once added remove it using the cross.
create-event.SELECT_COORDINATORS_LABEL: Select the coordinators of the event.
create-event.COORDINATORS_LABEL: Typing the first characters of a user name, a group name or a tag name make it selectable. Once added remove it using the cross.
create-event.CREATE_EVENT_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new event.

event-templates.TEMPLATES_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the event templates in your organisation.
event-templates.TEMPLATE_DEFINITION_LABEL: A template allows to define the recurrent content of a specific event type.
event-templates.SEARCH_LABEL: Type part of a word contained in the name of your models in the arising bar to perform a search.
event-templates.SORT_LABEL: Sort your templates by ascending or descending alphabetical order this button.
event-templates.NEW_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Create a new template using this button.
event-templates.TEMPLATE_CARD_LABEL: Each model is viewed as a card providing available actions.
event-templates.UPDATE_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Update properties of your model through this action.
event-templates.COPY_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Go fast by creatng a new model from this one through this action.
event-templates.REMOVE_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Remove your model through this action.

create-event-template.TEMPLATE_NAME_LABEL: Choose a name for your model.
create-event-template.TEMPLATE_ICON_LABEL: Choose an icon to easily recognize your model.
create-event-template.SELECT_ICON_LABEL: Select the icon in our large library.
create-event-template.SELECT_COLOR_LABEL: Select its color in our palette.
create-event-template.TEMPLATE_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Enter a detailed description for your model.
create-event-template.SELECT_PARTICIPANTS_LABEL: Select the default participants of the event.
create-event-template.PARTICIPANTS_LABEL: Typing the first characters of a user name, a group name or a tag name make it selectable. Once added remove it using the cross.
create-event-template.SELECT_COORDINATORS_LABEL: Select the default coordinators of the event.
create-event-template.COORDINATORS_LABEL: Typing the first characters of a user name, a group name or a tag name make it selectable. Once added remove it using the cross.
create-event-template.SELECT_LAYER_LABEL: Select the target geographical elements layer of the event.
create-event-template.LAYER_LABEL: Typing the first characters of the layer name make it selectable. Once added remove it using the cross.
create-event-template.ADD_WORKFLOW_LABEL: Add a workflow to your model using this option.
create-event-template.WORKFLOW_DEFINITION_LABEL: A process is a sequence of interactions. Each one defines a question a user has to go through before jumping to the next step.
create-event-template.WORKFLOW_LABEL: The steps sequence is visible in this section and you can switch to one or another by selecting it.
create-event-template.WORKFLOW_STEP_TITLE_LABEL: Choose a title for your step as visible by users.
create-event-template.WORKFLOW_STEP_ICON_LABEL: Choose an icon for your step to identify quickly the status of the participant within the process.
create-event-template.WORKFLOW_STEP_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Choose a description for your step as visible by users.
create-event-template.WORKFLOW_STEP_INTERACTION_LABEL: Choose possible responses for users in your step. Simply type each response and validate, this will create a chip.
create-event-template.WORKFLOW_STEP_INTERACTION_ICON_LABEL: By selecting the chip you will be able to change the associated icon so that you identify quickly the status of the participant within the process.
create-event-template.WORKFLOW_STEP_END_LABEL: Choose responses allowing users to quit the process at this step.
create-event-template.WORKFLOW_STEP_STAKEHOLDER_LABEL: Select which users will answer the question at this step.
create-event-template.WORKFLOW_ADD_STEP_LABEL: Add a step to your process when required.
create-event-template.WORKFLOW_REMOVE_STEP_LABEL: Remove a step from your process when required.
create-event-template.WORKFLOW_PREVIEW_STEP_LABEL: Preview the interactions of your process.
create-event-template.CREATE_TEMPLATE_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new template.

catalog.CATALOG_LABEL: This activity allows to manage the geographic catalog of your organisation, i.e. a digital map of what matters to you.
catalog.NAVIGATION_BAR_LINK_LABEL: Browse the available actions like location search
catalog.CATALOG_PANEL_LABEL: Open the catalog any time using this handle.
catalog.TIMELINE_LABEL: Open the timeline any time using this handle.
catalog.FAB_LABEL: Quickly execute actions related to map data using this button.

archived-events.HISTORY_LABEL: This activity provides a history view of your events displayed sequentially in a selected time range.
archived-events.TIME_RANGE_LABEL: Use this button to change the default time range.
archived-events.START_TIME_LABEL: Using the interactive calendar select the start date defining the oldest events that will be visible.
archived-events.END_TIME_LABEL: Using the interactive calendar select the end date defining the newest events that will be visible.
archived-events.SORT_LABEL: Last order events oldest or newest first using this button.
archived-events.HISTORY_SCROLL_LABEL: Browse your events by scrolling to the bottom of the screen.
archived-events.HISTORY_EVENTS_LABEL: You first need to select a relevant time range to display some events.
archived-events.HISTORY_DOWNLOAD_LABEL: Export your events as a CSV file to use it in a thrid-party application if you'd like.
archived-events.MAP_VIEW_LABEL: Switch to a map view of your events using this button.
archived-events.BY_TEMPLATE_LABEL: By default all events are grouped together but you can group them according to your templates using this button.
archived-events.BY_TEMPLATE_LAYERS_LABEL: Using the side panel you can then show/hide the events related to a particular template.
archived-events.HEATMAP_LABEL: Switch to a heatmap view of your events using this button.
archived-events.MAP_DOWNLOAD_LABEL: Export your events as a GeoJSON file to use it in a thrid-party mapping application if you'd like.
archived-events.HISTORY_VIEW_LABEL: Switch to a history view of your events using this button.
archived-events.CHART_VIEW_LABEL: Create statistics charts of your events using this button.
archived-events.CHART_LABEL: Charts allows to analyse the distribution (i.e. their count) of your events according to your templates.
archived-events.CHART_SAVE_LABEL: Tip: right-click on the graph anytime to export it as an image.
archived-events.CHART_SETTINGS_LABEL: Configure your chart using this button.
archived-events.CHART_TYPE_LABEL: Select the chart type: pie chart, bar chart, etc.
archived-events.CHART_COUNT_LABEL: Then select the number of templates per chart.
archived-events.CHART_COUNT_PAGINATION_LABEL: If the total number of templates is too much large different charts will be generated and you will be able to navigate through using the arrows on the screen sides.
archived-events.CHART_RENDER_LABEL: Last select the value to be displayed: events count, events percentage or participants count.
archived-events.CHART_DOWNLOAD_LABEL: Export your chart data as a CSV file to use it in a thrid-party application if you'd like.

plans.bronze_DESCRIPTION: Our basic version for users just getting started
plans.bronze_DETAILS:
Unlimited tags
Unlimited events
Up to {{groups}} groups
Up to {{event-templates}} templates
Up to {{members}} members
plans.silver_DESCRIPTION: Powerful enough to run a small business
plans.silver_DETAILS:
Unlimited tags
Unlimited events
Unlimited templates
Up to {{groups}} groups
Up to {{members}} members
plans.gold_DESCRIPTION: Powerful enough to run a large business
plans.gold_DETAILS:
Unlimited tags
Unlimited events
Unlimited templates
Unlimited groups
Up to {{members}} members
plans.diamond_DESCRIPTION: Custom plan tailored for your business, with more control and support
plans.diamond_DETAILS: Unlimited events</br>Unlimited tags</br>Unlimited groups</br>Unlimited templates</br>Unlimited members</br>Host on your servers</br>Custom branding</br>
